Segment.name: BTS
Segment.comment: To transmit identifying symbols, loads, empties, weights, lengths, horsepower, and related data

Field.name: Length
Field.comment: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Horsepower
Field.comment: Total horsepower for all engines in train

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BTS02 or BTS03 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BTS04 or BTS05 is present, then the other is required.
